description: GT eForm Column Field Events template with configurable methods

inputs.label: Record Tag
inputs.description: The Record Tag this events class is for.

inputs.label: First Field Tag
inputs.description: The name of the field to generate methods for

inputs.label: Edit
inputs.description: Whether to include the field edit method in the class

inputs.label: Change
inputs.description: Whether to include the field change method in the class
